title: Wellness & Privacy Statement
subtitle: SeeQi offers Eastern-inspired wellness insights. We are committed to handling your information transparently and securely.

health.title: Wellness Disclaimer
items: All SeeQi outputs are cultural and wellness references. They do not replace medical diagnosis or treatment.
Please consult qualified healthcare professionals if you experience discomfort or need professional advice.
We do not provide disease prediction or guaranteed therapeutic effects.

data.title: Data We May Collect
data.description: To generate personalised suggestions, we may process the following data points:
items: Palm and tongue images: used solely for quality analysis. Originals are deleted after processing unless you request storage.
Dream descriptions and emotional tags: help us match keywords. You may delete them at any time.
Basic information (for example language preference, time zone or optional forms): used to refine recommendations and localisation.

usage.title: How We Use Data
usage.description: Your data is used only for content generation, product improvement and anonymised analytics. We do not sell or disclose personal data to third parties without consent.

rights.title: Your Rights
items: Withdraw assessments and delete reports at any time. Registered users can manage this in “My Reports”.
Request data export or deletion by contacting privacy@seeqicloud.com. We respond within five business days.
If you sign in via third-party providers (e.g. Google, Apple), please also follow their privacy policies.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Questions about this statement? Email privacy@seeqicloud.com and we will respond within five business days.
